languages.text: "Ты слишком сильно давишь на перо, Люми, что за жирные линии? И тушь не высохла! Матушка душу из меня вытрясет, когда увидит пятно на манжете..."

traits.locale_text: "Ты слишком сильно давишь на перо, Люми, ну что за жирные линии? И тушь не успела высохнуть! Матушка душу из меня вытрясет, когда увидит чернильное пятно на манжете..."

languages.text: "You're pressing down too hard on your quill, Lumi. Look how thick your lines are! And the ink hasn't dried! Mother will be livid when she sees this stain on my cuff..."
languages.original_text: "Ты слишком сильно давишь на перо, Люми, что за жирные линии? И тушь не высохла! Матушка душу из меня вытрясет, когда увидит пятно на манжете..."

traits.locale_text: "You are pressing down on your quill too hard, Lumi. Why are these lines so thick? And the ink hasn't dried! Mother will be livid when she sees that stain on my cuff..."
"You are pressing down on your quill too hard, Lumi. Why are these lines so thick? And the ink hasn't dried! Mother will be livid when she sees that stain on my cuff..."
"You're pressing down too hard on your quill, Lumi. Look how thick your lines are! And the ink hasn't dried! Mother will be livid when she sees this stain on my cuff..."

"You're pressing down too hard on your quill, Lumi. Look how thick your lines are! And the ink hasn't dried! Mother will be livid when she sees this stain on my cuff..."

languages.text: « Tu appuies trop fort sur la plume, Lumi. Regarde comme tes lignes sont épaisses ! Et l'encre n'a même pas encore séché ! Mère fera une de ces têtes quand elle verra cette tache sur ma manche... »
languages.original_text: "You're pressing down too hard on your quill, Lumi. Look how thick your lines are! And the ink hasn't dried! Mother will be livid when she sees this stain on my cuff..."

traits.locale_text: « Tu appuies trop fort sur la plume, Lumi. Regarde comme tes lignes sont épaisses ! Et l'encre n'a même pas encore séché ! Mère fera une de ces têtes quand elle verra cette tache sur ma manche... »

languages.text: «Estás apretando demasiado con la pluma, Lumi. ¡Mira lo grueso que sale el trazo! ¡Y no has secado la tinta! Madre se va a poner furiosa cuando vea la mancha de la manga...».
languages.original_text: "You're pressing down too hard on your quill, Lumi. Look how thick your lines are! And the ink hasn't dried! Mother will be livid when she sees this stain on my cuff..."

traits.locale_text: «Estás apretando demasiado con la pluma, Lumi. ¡Mira lo grueso que sale el trazo! ¡Y no has secado la tinta! Madre se va a poner furiosa cuando vea la mancha de la manga...».

languages.text: 「羽ペンを強く押し付けすぎだ、ルミ。線が太すぎる！インクも乾いてないじゃないか！僕の袖口のシミを見たら、母さんがカンカンだぞ…」
languages.original_text: "You're pressing down too hard on your quill, Lumi. Look how thick your lines are! And the ink hasn't dried! Mother will be livid when she sees this stain on my cuff..."

traits.locale_text: 「羽ペンを強く押し付けすぎだ、ルミ。線が太すぎる！インクも乾いてないじゃないか！僕の袖口のシミを見たら、母さんがカンカンだぞ…」

languages.text: “你压笔压得太用力了，露米！看看你画出来的线有多粗！而且墨水还没干！要是让妈妈看到我袖子上的污点，她一定会气得脸色发青……”
languages.original_text: "You're pressing down too hard on your quill, Lumi. Look how thick your lines are! And the ink hasn't dried! Mother will be livid when she sees this stain on my cuff..."

traits.locale_text: “你压笔压得太用力了，露米！看看你画出来的线有多粗！而且墨水还没干！要是让妈妈看到我袖子上的污点，她一定会气得脸色发青……”

languages.text: "Du drückst die Feder zu stark auf, Lumi. Sieh nur, wie dick deine Linien sind! Und die Tinte ist auch noch nicht trocken! Mutter wird wütend sein, wenn sie diesen Fleck auf meiner Manschette sieht ..."
languages.original_text: "You're pressing down too hard on your quill, Lumi. Look how thick your lines are! And the ink hasn't dried! Mother will be livid when she sees this stain on my cuff..."

traits.locale_text: "Du drückst die Feder zu stark auf, Lumi. Sieh nur, wie dick deine Linien sind! Und die Tinte ist auch noch nicht trocken! Mutter wird wütend sein, wenn sie diesen Fleck auf meiner Manschette sieht ..."

languages.text: "Tüy kalemini çok bastırıyorsun Lumi. Çizgilerinin ne kadar kalın olduğuna bak! Hem de daha mürekkep kurumadı bile! Kolumdaki lekeyi gördüğünde annemin tepesi atacak..."
languages.original_text: "You're pressing down too hard on your quill, Lumi. Look how thick your lines are! And the ink hasn't dried! Mother will be livid when she sees this stain on my cuff..."
